channel.title: Comments on: MTN Broadband MiFi MF927U Review: All You Need To Know
channel.description: Web × Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-mifi-review/#comment-1702">Browser Global Tech</a>.
I no longer use it. I have trashed it. I now use the MTN 5G Router, and Starlink
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Browser Global Tech.

I no longer use it. I have trashed it. I now use the MTN 5G Router, and Starlink

item.title: By: Browser Global Tech
item.dc:creator: Browser Global Tech
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-mifi-review/#comment-1373">Yusuf Odukoya</a>.
Those ones that you have, are they havujg thua type of sim card tray? If they have it and you can sell/give to me, i wont mind, mine is just there and can't use it without sim holder tray
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Yusuf Odukoya.

Those ones that you have, are they havujg thua type of sim card tray? If they have it and you can sell/give to me, i wont mind, mine is just there and can’t use it without sim holder tray

item.title: By: Chinedu
item.dc:creator: Chinedu
item.description: Mine has charging issues. When I charge it with my charger or power-bank, it starts charging and stops all of a sudden without being fully charged. Most times I have to turn it off first for it to charge. Could it be the battery or the charging port?
item.content:encoded: Mine has charging issues. When I charge it with my charger or power-bank, it starts charging and stops all of a sudden without being fully charged. Most times I have to turn it off first for it to charge. Could it be the battery or the charging port?

item.title: By: Chinedu
item.dc:creator: Chinedu
item.description: My battery doesn’t charge fully anymore, whether I use the charger or with my powerbank. If I plug it, it will start charging and stop all of a sudden. Sometimes I have to turn it off for it to charge completely. What could be the problem?
item.content:encoded: My battery doesn’t charge fully anymore, whether I use the charger or with my powerbank. If I plug it, it will start charging and stop all of a sudden. Sometimes I have to turn it off for it to charge completely. What could be the problem?

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-mifi-review/#comment-1625">Martha</a>.
A lot of things may have changed since this offer was first announced. The offer may even have ended. So, reach out to MTN via X (Formerly Twitter), or call their customer care number.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Martha.

A lot of things may have changed since this offer was first announced. The offer may even have ended. So, reach out to MTN via X (Formerly Twitter), or call their customer care number.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya

item.description:

Yes. They share so many similarities you would hardly notice any difference.
item.content:encoded:

Yes. They share so many similarities you would hardly notice any difference.

item.title: By: Martha
item.dc:creator: Martha
item.description: Please I've tried sending activate via Sms by inswrting the mifi sim in my phone for my free 30gb but it says sorry this device 8s not ek8gibke for the mifi offer. How else am I supposed to activate it?
item.content:encoded: Please I’ve tried sending activate via Sms by inswrting the mifi sim in my phone for my free 30gb but it says sorry this device 8s not ek8gibke for the mifi offer. How else am I supposed to activate it?

item.title: By: just lee
item.dc:creator: just lee
item.description: <span>sorry, please is this ZTE MF927U version the same with ZTE MF927 without the "U"? I'm curious</span>
item.content:encoded: sorry, please is this ZTE MF927U version the same with ZTE MF927 without the “U”? I’m curious

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-mifi-review/#comment-1578">Miracle onuoha</a>.
Havt you tried setting Metered Mode or Low Data Mode on all connected Devices?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Miracle onuoha.

Havt you tried setting Metered Mode or Low Data Mode on all connected Devices?
